snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg appeared with William M. Daley, a former White House chief of staff, in Chicago, and with media mogul Rupert Murdoch in Boston to promote proposals on immigration reform and urge a more vigorous discussion of the topic in...
abstract: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg appeared with William M. Daley, a former White House chief of staff, in Chicago, and with media mogul Rupert Murdoch in Boston to promote proposals on immigration reform and urge a more vigorous discussion of the topic in the presidential campaign.

byline.original: By KAREN ANN CULLOTTA and JESS BIDGOOD

headline.main: Bloomberg Urges Campaigns to Discuss Immigration Reform
